TopicTitle: Speedlink Black Widow Calibration on Windows 8

Articles.Content: I have a new Black Widow joystick and am having trouble getting it calibrated through windows 8. Has anyone gone through this before if so would be grateful for any help about how to do this from first principles / scratch. Thanks all.

T_and_i Did you work out how to calibrate your joystick? I've got the same problem.

Thanks:(
